articles.title: Crypto Prices Today March 19: Bitcoin Drops To $65K, ETH At $3300, PEPE Plunges 20% - CoinGape
articles.description: The crypto prices today crashed massively as Bitcoin traded near $65,000 and Ethereum plunged to the $3,300 level.
articles.content:
Story Highlights
  • Bitcoin dropped over 4% and traded above $65,000.
  • Ethereum plunged to the $3,300 level.
  • Solana, XRP, Cardano, and Pepe Coin slumped significantly.
